\u0026 Jets","features":["PILOTED FLIGHT - Grab a sheet of paper, fold it, and go! Instantly put yourself in the cockpit of an amazing smartphone controlled paper airplane that does high speed tricks. The bluetooth module, which includes autopilot control, connects to your phone so you can experience the sensation of flying countless paper, foam, and even Balsa Wood airplane models. INCREDIBLE STABILITY - Loops, Barrel Rolls, \u0026 Hammerheads are achieved with the special Acro Mode! Your paper plane’s onboard computer automatically calibrates your paper airplane for imperfect weather with a built-in launch assist and wind stabilizer. Now hobbyists, tinkerers, or students can become the flight controller! RAPID CHARGING - A 30 minute quick charge gives you 10 minutes of flight time along with an incredible range of up to 230ft! Traveling up to 20mph, your plane will spend less time on the tarmac and more time in the air. Simply connect the included micro USB cable to a charging port and plot out your next journey. STEM READY - Experience the aerodynamic forces that make flight possible through various wing configurations. Lift, drag, thrust, and gravity are learned first hand. Purchase the Night-Flight Kit and Accessory Kit to see how different parts create a new experience. Great for an outdoor class or exploration together with family. DURABLE - A near indestructible heavy duty carbon fiber body includes a nylon reinforced nose and motor mount. The POWERUP 4.0 paper airplane set is designed to withstand bumps, bangs, and even an unexpected crash. If your paper plane flies out of range, the onboard computer will safely land itself! Includes a one year warranty."],"images":["https://m.media-amazon.com/images/I/41FnmkkHh5L._SL500_.jpg","https://m.media-amazon.com/images/I/51C9LLtxlWL._SL500_.jpg","https://m.media-amazon.com/images/I/41k3ts8dsML._SL500_.jpg","https://m.media-amazon.com/images/I/41PIOPA0jFL._SL500_.jpg","https://m.media-amazon.com/images/I/61twnEUbB9L._SL500_.jpg","https://m.media-amazon.com/images/I/418BRE9FXrL._SL500_.jpg","https://m.media-amazon.com/images/I/51TH6iE4qbL._SL500_.jpg"],"name":"Smartphone Controlled Paper Airplane Kit","image":{"id":"e14181b7-a755-4f2a-8ea2-be195b0cf71a","aws_url":"https://vader-prod.s3.amazonaws.com/1682708372-71ZXNM-jb6L.jpg","filename":"71ZXNM-jb6L.jpg","height":2048,"image_metadata":{"seo_meta_description":"POWERUP 4.0 The Next-Generation Smartphone Controlled Paper Airplane Kit, RC Controlled. Turns out, the best things do come in small packages.\nRead on for all you need to know about IPSY gift cards and how to score yours for the holidays.\nHow can I send an IPSY gift card?\nOK, so you’ve got just the person in mind to send an IPSY gift card this year. Here’s how you do it. First, visit IPSY.com/Gifting to purchase a gift card. You’ll choose a gift amount in increments of $20, $50, and $100. If you’d like a higher amount, you can send additional gift cards to increase the total combined value. Then, enter your recipient’s name and email address, and add a personalized message to send with the gift card. Once you place your order, it will be emailed to your recipient shortly after with instructions for redeeming it. You’ll also receive an email confirmation so you know it’s been sent. That’s it!\nHow do I redeem an IPSY gift card?\nIf you’re the lucky recipient of an IPSY gift card or you’d like to help someone redeem theirs, here’s how. In the email you received with your gift card, click the “REDEEM MY GIFT” button, and follow the instructions to make your purchase(s). It’s important to note that gift cards must be redeemed for purchases, not cash. Want to wait to start shopping? No problem. Your gift card balance never expires, and it will be applied to your membership and future IPSY purchases until it runs out. After that, we’ll use your payment method on file.\nFor full details on IPSY gift cards, check out IPSY.com/Gifting. type="application/ld+json">[{"@type":"NewsArticle","thumbnailUrl":"https://hips.hearstapps.com/hmg-prod/images/colourful-gift-boxes-on-light-blue-background-royalty-free-image-1690847946.jpg?crop=1.00xw:0.669xh;0,0.127xh&resize=100:*","datePublished":"2022-11-15T22:08:39.893780Z EST","headline":"The Best Gifts of 2024 — All in One Place","articleBody":"Here at Good Housekeeping, gifting is at the top of our resume.In addition to all of the products that are rigorously tested in the Good Housekeeping Institute, our editors and experts are also spending hundreds of hours searching for the best gift ideas. And we do this all year, every year, for birthdays, anniversaries, holidays — you name it. For 2023, we've dug deep into our gift guide data and read thousands of reviews to find the most popular gift ideas for anyone you're shopping for, be it the women who have everything, the hard-to-shop for men or those tweens and teens ruled by trends. On top of that, we use our expert knowledge and diligent testing to bring you the best new toys for kids this year. Anything we've recommended has either been independently selected by editors after a lot of research or has actually been approved by our experts and testers.  That said, scroll on to find the best gift ideas for 2023 — you can shop by person or price — And be sure to leave us a comment below to let us know your favorites.The Most Popular Gifts of 2024These are the top items our readers are adding to their carts this season across all categories. Everything you see here is under $60, with many actually way less than that. People are gifting things that will stand the test of time, but still offer some fun or hit a trend.Didn't find your perfect present yet? Not to worry. Below, you'll find the top gifts our readers are spending their money on. We've got ideas for literally everyone, no matter the size of the gift you want to give or the budget you need to stick to.                                Advent CalendarsBefore any gift giving get started, have you picked out your family's advent calendar? Sure, you can go the classic chocolate route, but these days, the options are endless when it comes to the little surprises you can find as you countdown 'til the big day.Best Advent Calendars OverallBest Advent Calendars for KidsReusable Advent CalendarsAdvent Calendars for Teens and TweensCheese Advent Calendars Beauty Advent CalendarsChocolate Advent CalendarsCute DIY Advent Calendar IdeasFun Sock Advent CalendarsWine Advent CalendarsWhere to Buy Lego Advent CalendarsCool Advent Calendars for MenBest Coffee Advent CalendarsUnique Advent Calendar IdeasBest Stocking Stuffers Everyone looks for at least a little something in their stocking come Christmas Day. But you shouldn't break the bank for a unique stuffer. Here are the best ideas under $15 that readers are loving:Best Stocking Stuffer IdeasBest Stocking Stuffers for KidsBest Stocking Stuffer Ideas for ToddlersBest Stocking Stuffer Ideas for MenBest Stocking Stuffer Ideas for TeensBest Stocking Stuffers on AmazonGift Sets For when you want to make a really great impression, go for a gift set that contains a bunch of goodies, all neatly packaged and ready to give!Best Gift Sets for WomenBeauty Gift SetsBest Gift BasketsOprah's Favorite Things 2024When you shop from Oprah's Favorite Things list, you know you'll be getting them something they'll love. This year, the gift guide was filled with incredible ideas from small businesses and a variety of BIPOC-, women- and veteran-founded companies. Gifts for HerGoing back to classics, bags are at the top of the list for women this year, as are pieces of jewelry that only look expensive and cute clothes made for lounging. Here are the top picks, but you can shop more guides below.Gifts for Women Gifts for WivesGifts for MomGifts for Mother-in-LawGifts for GirlfriendGifts for GrandmaGifts for SistersGifts for Sisters-in-LawGifts for Aunts Gifts for Women in Their 20sGifts for Women in Their 30sGifts for Women in Their 40sGifts for Women in Their 50sGifts for Pregnant WomenGifts for New MomsGifts for HimSimilar to last year, people are buying gifts that are more fun than practical for the men in their lives. And if it has some sort of tech element or smart feature, that's even better. Gifts for MenGifts for HusbandsGifts for DadGifts for Dads Who Have EverythingGifts for New DadsGifts for Father-in-LawGifts for BoyfriendGifts for GrandpaGifts for BrothersGifts for Brothers-in-LawGifts for UnclesTech GiftsSpeaking of tech gifts, with Black Friday and Cyber Monday coming, laptops, smartphones and more will be heavily discounted. Don't miss out on these must-haves:Best Tech Gifts for the Gadget-ObsessedBest Smart Watches for MenBest Smart Watches for WomenBest Kids' Tablets for Learning and GamingBest Remote-Controlled Cars Best Laptops You Can BuyBest Smart Water Bottles Best Smart LuggageBest Smart NotebooksGifts for Tweens and TeensWe had to call in our top experts for these categories as this age group is notoriously hard to shop for. Luckily, Rachel Rothman, chief technologist and executive technical director at the Good Housekeeping Institute, and Marisa LaScala, our senior parenting and relationships editor answered the call. They polled dozens of real-life tweens and teenagers to round up this list, and found many want the latest tech gadgets, cool stuff for their rooms and fun fidget toys.
